messages.subject: Books and Iron Tsuba for Sale
messages.msgSnippet: Dear list, I ve put some books on ebay: http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQsassZnycurranQQhtZ-1 tinyurl:   http://tinyurl.com/2ygj9p
messages.messageBody:
Dear list,

I've put some books on ebay:

http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQsassZnycurranQQhtZ-1

tinyurl: http://tinyurl.com/2ygj9p
_____________________________________________________

To make way for a new purchase, I've also had to dig
into my iron tsuba collection and offer up 4 of them
for sale. Intent is to let 2 of them sale, and then
keep the other 2.

They are:

(1) Echizen Nobuiye $1000
w/ gold shims. Massive linear tekkotsu in rim.

(2) Ko-shoami/early shoami "Snowflakes" design $1000
Large tsuba. Condition is excellent.

(3) Tochibata or Early Owari $1050
Simple, strong, beautiful old patina.
Does like to be photographed.

(4) Nobuie "Poem" (Utsushi) by Issei Naruki $1050
Massive piece, weighing 9.5 oz. Signed front
and back. Naruki is a modern smith tsuba smith.
Still alive and highly respected in Japan. I
saw 4 pieces by him recently. Average price
was $1250

If anyone is interested, please ask for photos of
whichever tsuba, and I will politely forward photos.


Curran
